post.title: sealed bnib blackberry bold 2 9700 onyx locked to rogers gta downtown
post.content: for sale is sealed, bnib, lock to rogers blackberry bold 2, 9700 onyx in rogers retail box that you would normally get from a rogers store. the price is $550.00 firm. no offers.... please call 416 273-6088 for a quick transaction to arrange face to face, pick-up in a public place at yonge bloor area.
